name: dining_room
description: You are in a large, sumptuous dining room. There is nothing but silver cutlery on the expansive table and a chandelier dangles from the ceiling. But actually, that's not the only thing dangling from the ceiling.

table.description: The player wants to search the table.
table.effect: He will not find anything extraordinary. It seems like there was a large dinner party. Most of the food is left untouched (Describe the food).

body.description: The player wants to investigate the body.
body.effect: The victim was dressed in a very fancy suit and you can immediately see that he was very rich (Explain why). But just when ver Bindung wants to give up his search, he finds something interesting: A small note inside one of the jacket's pocket.

note.description: The player wants to open/read the note.
note.effect: The note is a ripped piece of paper. On it is written "You disappointed it!"

kitchen.description: If the player wants to, he can leave this room and enter the kitchen

living_room.description: If the player wants to, he can leave this room and enter the kitchen
